price: 14. Tonna hinnay usuk Yallih kitaabâ ikkal, usun abak sugen urna taamoomi (dambi kinnuk) ken sorkocobaxitte buulteh Qhuraan nummaysaanamak.
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
